party.intro: Here's a quick look at the controls.
party.step1Desc: See what's playing and who is singing. Look for the **Spotify Link** if available!
party.step2Desc: Search YouTube for any karaoke song. Fairness rules ensure everyone gets a turn!
party.step3Desc: Get inspiration from host themes, **Hot on Spotify**, and Top Played songs.
party.step4Desc: Check the queue. Tap the üëè button to send applause and boost scores!

host.title: Host Controls
host.desc: A quick guide to managing your party.
host.step1Desc: Share the **Join Link** with singers. Open the **Player Link** on your TV.
host.step2Desc: Use **Start Party** to begin. Hit **Intermission** to pause and show slides.
host.step3Desc: Play, pause, skip, or enable **Manual Sort** to drag-and-drop.
host.step5Desc: Add **Theme Suggestions** to inspire song choices.
host.step6Desc: Create custom messages to display on TV when idle.
host.step7Desc: Add a **Spotify Playlist ID** or Link.
